description: Current and avg. KPI-s. Expects 'get_load_average' and 'backends'  helpers to be installed on the monitored DB.

targets.query: SELECT max("load_5min") FROM "cpu_load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "dbname" fill(null) slimit 5
SELECT max("load_5min") FROM "cpu_load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "dbname" fill(null) slimit 5
SELECT dbname, max("load_5min") FROM "cpu_load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)  fill(none) limit 5
SELECT max("load_5min") FROM "cpu_load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "dbname" fill(null) slimit 5
SELECT max("cpu_utilization") as "Alert Count" FROM "psutil_cpu" WHERE  $timeFilter   group by time(3m) fill(null)

targets.rawSql: select md_unique_name as dbname from monitored_db where  "md_group" = $md_group order by md_id;

targets.query: select continuous_discovery_prefix, max("group") from configured_dbs where $timeFilter AND "group" = '$md_group'
